# ic-tab-panel



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description                                                                                                                               | Type     | Default     |
| ----------- | ------------ | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `contextId` | `context-id` | <span style="color:red">**[DEPRECATED]**</span> This is no longer required. The context id is passed down from `ic-tab-context`<br/><br/> | `string` | `"default"` |


## Events

| Event             | Description                                      | Type                                 |
| ----------------- | ------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------ |
| `tabPanelCreated` | Emitted when a tab panel is dynamically created. | `CustomEvent<HTMLIcTabPanelElement>` |
| `tabPanelRemoved` | Emitted when a tab panel is unmounted.           | `CustomEvent<void>`                  |
